resources.string: The Apple iPhone 7 Plus is the latest single SIM smartphone by Apple It is available in five different color variants for example, Jet Black, Silver, Gold, Black and Rose Gold. So, you can select any of them that matches your style perfectly.

As compared to Apple iPhone 6, this phone comes well equipped with an impressive 5.5 inch retina HD display in the resolution of 1080 by 1920 pixels which is the most colorful and brightest display yet. Whether you are viewing live photographs that you click in tropic zone or checking out the dress photos, you will get a true representation. Its retina HD display is integrated with 3D Touch so you can easily interact with Mail, Calendar, Messages, and apps in a great way. If you are watching videos, viewing images or reading an e-book, you will have a great visual experience. Plus, it will add life to all of your stuff, whether it is a photo, video or game.

Advanced Dual Cameras.
 Brilliant 5.5 Inches Display similar to OnePlus 5.
 Best-in-class Stereo Speakers.
 New A10 Fusion Chip.
 Durable 2900mAh Non-removable Battery.
